general.name: NetLogix - Enable Modern Auth Office 2013 (All Users)
general.description: Loops through all user profiles on the local machine, loads the registry hive, and adds the following registry keys: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Exchange\AlwaysUseMSOAuthForAutoDiscover=1 HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Office\15.0\Common\Identity\EnableADAL=1 HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Office\15.0\Common\Identity\Version=1
